sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Table Rotation for  Analytics Data Points Queue</description>
        <name>Table Rotation - Analytics Data Points</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[// Make sure business rules are running after the insertion.
var session = gs.getSession();
session.setWorkflow(true);
var tableName = 'sys_analytics_data_points_queue';
var rotations = 3;
var duration = '1970-01-02 00:00:00'; // copied from the existing value. This means 1
var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_table_rotation');
gr.addQuery('name', tableName);
gr.query();
if(gr.next()) {
	gs.info(getScriptName()+'The table rotation for '+ tableName+' table already exists. No record will be created');
}
else {
	gr.setWorkflow(true);
	gr.setValue('name', tableName);
	gr.setValue('duration', duration);
	gr.setValue('type', 'rotate');
	gr.setValue('rotations', rotations);
	var sysId = gr.insert();
	gs.info(getScriptName()+'The table rotation for '+tableName+' is now created by the fix-script. sys_id='+sysId);
}
function getScriptName() {
	return 'Fix_Script:Table Rotation for Analytics Data Points Queue:';
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-05-20 18:16:34</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>daa2f38a776701105679bcc8ca5a9987</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Table Rotation - Analytics Data Points</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="User Experience Analytics" source="com.glide.appsee">2444f4a83c31311068bcf327dfe37f2c</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_daa2f38a776701105679bcc8ca5a9987</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-05-20 18:16:34</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
